title: Annual Lippert Axle Inspection
purpose: Verify condition and safety of Lippert 8K axle system on customer RV.
scope: All 8K axles in Lippert suspension configurations.
safety: Ensure vehicle is locked out and properly supported
procedure: Chock wheels and raise vehicle per Lippert manual.
Remove wheel assembly and inspect axle beam.
Check for rust, cracks, or wear.
troubleshooting: If cracks or excessive rust found, mark axle for replacement.
